text.en: Oṃ svasti
text.en-trans: om swasti

text.en: Clouds of compassion gather in the sky-like dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: chöying kha la tukjé chudzin trik

text.en: To bring the delightful thunder and lightning of wisdom and love
text.en-trans: khyentsé dé tung nyenpé yar nga drok

text.en: And shower a timely rain of common and supreme accomplishments —
text.en-trans: choktün ngödrub drang char beb dzepa

text.en: Precious guru, all-pervasive lord of every buddha family, I bow before you.
text.en-trans: rik kün khyabdak jetsün lamar dü

text.en: Dance-like form of all-pervasive, unchanging wisdom,
text.en-trans: mingyur künkhyab yeshe zuk kyi gar

text.en: You appear with the signs and marks like the moon’s reflection in water;
text.en-trans: tsenpé chudé nangnyen jisi du

text.en: Immutable sambhogakāya, perfect with the five certainties —
text.en-trans: mi yo longchö ngepa ngaden dzok

text.en: The source of all emanations, great Vairocana, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: trulzhi namnang chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Your nature is the mighty Samantabhadra Vajradhara,
text.en-trans: ji ta kunzang dorjé chang wang gi

text.en: Yet you appear as the compiler of the great secret teachings,
text.en-trans: jinyé sang chen ka yi duwa por

text.en: Lauded by the oceanic Buddhas as if in a single voice —
text.en-trans: rabjam gyalwé drin chik ngak dzepa

text.en: Lord of Secrets, Vajradharma, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: sangdak dorjé chö la solwa deb

text.en: When you completed your service to Śākyamuni, Kinsman of the Sun,
text.en-trans: nyimé nyen gyi sizhu tarchin né

text.en: Five hundred arhats laid down their robes to serve as your seat,
text.en-trans: drachom ngabgyé nam jar tingwé teng

text.en: And with the words, ‘Thus have I heard’,
text.en-trans: di ké dak gi tö zhé ka dü sol

text.en: You began to compile the Buddha’s words — Ānanda, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ché dzé küngawo la solwa deb

text.en: When a volume of tantra fell onto the roof of your palace, a most marvellous sign,
text.en-trans: ngotsar té zhin tantré lekbam char

text.en: You practiced its method of Vajrasattva,
text.en-trans: khang teng ngö su bab né dorjé sem

text.en: Beheld the deity and realized the innermost meaning —
text.en-trans: drubpé zhal ten nyingpö gyü tok ten

text.en: King Jaḥ, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gyalpo dza zhé drak la solwa deb

text.en: Nāgārjuna entrusted you with the tradition of the Middle Way,
text.en-trans: na gar dzu né umé zhing ta té

text.en: You whose birth was supreme and who mastered the three baskets,
text.en-trans: kyewé chokgyur denö khepé pul

text.en: Renowned as one of the Six Ornaments who beautify the world —
text.en-trans: dzamling dzepé gyen druk trengwé ü

text.en: Āryadeva, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: arya dewar drak la solwa deb

text.en: Accepted by Jalandhara, you accomplished Cakrasaṃvara,
text.en-trans: dza landha ré jezung demchok drub

text.en: Clarified the six treatises, were lauded by thousands of accomplished ones,
text.en-trans: zhung druk sal dzé drubchen tong tsé dü

text.en: And brought the people of thirteen great lands to maturity and liberation —
text.en-trans: yul chen chusum kyewo mindrol dzé

text.en: Mahāsiddha Kṛṣṇācārya, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drubchen nakpo chöpar solwa deb

text.en: Great minister in the service of King Songtsen Gampo,
text.en-trans: song tsen jé yi dün na dön chenpo

text.en: You invented the Tibetan script and paved the way for Tibet’s literary traditions,
text.en-trans: sil jong tsuklak shingta yigé sol

text.en: You translated from the languages of India into Tibetan and thus became the original lotsāwa —
text.en-trans: tö ching pak bö tokmé lotsawa

text.en: Tönmi Sambhoṭa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tu mi sam bho ta la solwa deb

text.en: Through the mantra practice of the glorious heruka Tobden Nakpo,
text.en-trans: palchen tobden nakpö rik ngak lé

text.en: You gained the power to curse, crush and annihilate all negative forces
text.en-trans: tu tob tsal gyi möpé lokdren kün

text.en: And to bring their entourages under your control —
text.en-trans: zir zhing tsarchö jesu dzin la wang

text.en: Vidyādhara Śāntigarbha, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rigdzin shanting garbhar solwa deb

text.en: You upheld the Vinaya piṭaka of ethical discipline, the root of Buddha’s teaching;
text.en-trans: gyalten tsawa tsultrim denö dzin

text.en: Having lived nine hundred years, you served as royal chaplain to Tibet’s court,
text.en-trans: gugya zhi tsé bö jé lachö dzé

text.en: And were renowned throughout India and Tibet for skilfully combining the views of Middle Way and Mind Only —
text.en-trans: pak bö yong drak u sem zungjuk sol

text.en: Great abbot Śāntarakṣita, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jé khé khenchen zhitsor solwa deb

text.en: One of the first seven monastics of Tibet’s snowy land,
text.en-trans: gangjong tokmé rabjung sé mi dré

text.en: You followed twenty-one learned teachers and underwent fifty major hardships,
text.en-trans: ngedön penchen dragyur mawé zol

text.en: Becoming a translator and true scholar —
text.en-trans: khepa nyerchik kachen ngabchü ten

text.en: Master lotsāwa Vairotsana, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lochen bai ro tsa nar solwa deb

text.en: Yeshe Dorje, Padmasambhava’s regent,1
text.en-trans: pemé gyaltsab yeshe dorjé yi

text.en: Received a prophecy concerning this emanation in a pure vision
text.en-trans: dakpé zik nang gang gi dögar du

text.en: And issued a secret proclamation accordingly —
text.en-trans: lung gi ukyung sung gi sangwachen

text.en: Nyak lotsāwa Jñānakumāra, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: nyak lo yeshe zhön nor solwa deb

text.en: Having received instructions from Padmasambhava and Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: bimala dang pema sambha wé

text.en: You practiced them and, as a sign of accomplishment, could pass through sold rock;
text.en-trans: dampé jezung ri drak zangtal drö

text.en: By liberating the evil king, you returned Tibet to happiness —
text.en-trans: dik gyal dral né böyul pender kö

text.en: Lhalung Palgyi Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lha lung pal gyi dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Through teaching and practice, you spread the Early Translation lineages of So, Zur and Nup,
text.en-trans: ngagyur kabab so zur nub sum lé

text.en: The Sūtra, Illusory Web and Mind,2
text.en-trans: do gyu sem chok shé dang drubpa yi

text.en: Throughout the cool and bountiful land of Tibet —
text.en-trans: silden nordzin khyön kün dalwar dzé

text.en: Zurchen Shakya Jungne, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: zur chen shak jung zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the Chim clan, you became a monk in Lumé Khenpo’s line,3
text.en-trans: chim kyi rik trung lu mé khen bu lé

text.en: And took from a pillar in the central temple at Samyé
text.en-trans: rabtu jung zhing u tsé kawa né

text.en: The four medical tantras translated by Vairotsana —
text.en-trans: bai rö gyurwé so rik gyü zhi chung

text.en: Drapa Ngönshé Wangchuk Bar, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dra ngön wangchuk bar la solwa deb

text.en: Mañjuśrī appearing in human form,
text.en-trans: jampal nyingpo mi yi zol zung né

text.en: You excelled at grammar, logic, scripture and reasoning,
text.en-trans: dratsé lung rik mawé khyuchok ché

text.en: And were praised by Indian and Tibetan scholars and translators alike —
text.en-trans: pak bö lo pen dumé ngakpé yul

text.en: Rongzom Chökyi Zangpo, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rong zom pandita la solwa deb

text.en: You alone received the most profound, whispered Dharma
text.en-trans: pendrub chenpo naro tapa yi

text.en: From the great realized scholar, Nāropa,
text.en-trans: kün la bé chö yangzab nyengyü té

text.en: And brought benefit and happiness to the land of Nepal —
text.en-trans: sachö balpö yul kham pender kö

text.en: Pamting Jigme Drakpa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: pam ting jikme drakpar solwa deb

text.en: Relying on many masters from India, Nepal and Tibet,
text.en-trans: gyagar bal bö shenyen duma ten

text.en: You achieved supreme accomplishment, becoming Saraha’s equal,
text.en-trans: chok gi gopang sara ha dang nyam

text.en: And through the common attainment of longevity, lived 150 years —
text.en-trans: tünmong tsé ngö gya dang ngabchur zhé

text.en: Learned and accomplished Khyungpo Naljor, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khedrub khyungpor drak la solwa deb

text.en: Majestically adorning the crowns of myriad scholars of India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: pakyul penchen gyatsö tsuk na ji

text.en: You set out A Lamp for the Path by combining major works and pith-instructions,
text.en-trans: zhung dang damngak zungdrel lam drön sal

text.en: And, as the sole ornament of the Buddha’s teaching, your fame spread throughout the three worlds —
text.en-trans: tubten gyen chik sa sum nyenpar khyab

text.en: Lord Atiśa Dīpaṃkara, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jowo dipam karar solwa deb

text.en: As the ḍākinī prophesied, you became the closest spiritual son
text.en-trans: gangchen drub gyé chimé mi la jer

text.en: Of Lord Milarepa, the great forefather of all yogis in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: khandrö lungten nyewé sé chikpu

text.en: And brought oral instructions from India’s noble land —
text.en-trans: pakpé yul né nyengyü dampa lang

text.en: Rechung Dorje Drak, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: réchung dorjé drak la solwa deb

text.en: You perfected and upheld the Vinaya collection,
text.en-trans: tubwang tenpé nang dzö dulwé der

text.en: Which is the inner treasure of the Buddha’s teaching,
text.en-trans: jangpa puljung mumé dzin kyong gi

text.en: And ordained many saffron-clad monks throughout the land —
text.en-trans: serden ngurmik changwé dokpor dzé

text.en: Chadul Tsöndrü Bar, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ja dul tsöndrü bar la solwa deb

text.en: A great paṇḍita throughout twenty-five consecutive lives,
text.en-trans: kyé treng nyerngar penchen tsul zhé shing

text.en: Who, as the Treasury of Reasoning shows, excelled in exposition, debate and composition,
text.en-trans: rik ter gyi tsön ché tsö tsompé pul

text.en: Crown adornment of all scholars in the Land of Snows —
text.en-trans: gangchen khepé tsukgyen daknyi ché

text.en: Sakya Paṇḍita, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: sakya pandita la solwa deb

text.en: Holder of the life-force of the Nyingtik lineage,
text.en-trans: bi mé kasol mengak nyingtik gi

text.en: The pith instructions from Vimalamitra’s tradition,
text.en-trans: gyüpé sok zung khyepar dorsem kyi

text.en: Especially the Dzogchen empowerment and instructions of Vajrasattva —
text.en-trans: dzogpachenpö wang dang dampa té

text.en: Drupchen Melong Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drubchen melong dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Having reached the far shore of ocean-like tenets, outer and inner,
text.en-trans: chinang drubta gyatsö tarsönpé

text.en: You proclaimed the lion’s roar of the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: lung rik tek chok sengé dra drokpa

text.en: And were renowned as Mañjuśrī incarnate throughout the cool lands of Tibet —
text.en-trans: silden jong kyi jampal yang zhé drak

text.en: Longchenpa Drimé Özer, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: drimé özer zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born into a family that followed the Early Translations,
text.en-trans: yabmé ngagyur rik trung kadam kyi

text.en: You upheld the Kadam tradition and became a teacher to Lord Tsongkhapa,
text.en-trans: ringluk dzin ching jetsün tsongkhapé

text.en: And holder of the teachings of the oral lineage —
text.en-trans: rik kyi chöpen nyengyü tenpé dak

text.en: Lhodrak Lekyi Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lho drak lé kyi dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Eminent amongst Jamgön Lobzang Drakpa’s disciples,
text.en-trans: jamgön lozang drakpé khor gyi ü

text.en: With perfect wisdom, you mastered hundreds of texts,
text.en-trans: khyen rab puljung zhung gya mawé wang

text.en: And among your marvellous deeds, established glorious Drepung —
text.en-trans: palden dré pung trün sok tukkyé mé

text.en: Jamyang Tashi, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jamyang tashi drak la solwa deb

text.en: You adopted the guise of a disciplined holder of the Vinaya,
text.en-trans: trimden dulwa dzinpé tsul zung yang

text.en: Yet with the confidence of your inner realization, pleased Pema Lingpa
text.en-trans: tokpé deng gi pema lingpa dang

text.en: And others blessed with the fortune of terma —
text.en-trans: ter kal zhal gyé chöjé zha dé'u

text.en: Dharma Lord, Shadeu Trulshik Kunga, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: trulzhik künga drak la solwa deb

text.en: Master of the Six Branches connected with the Vajra Yoga,
text.en-trans: dorjé naljor dang drel jordruk ché

text.en: And the instructions flowing like the Ganges from the Kalki kings,
text.en-trans: rikden nam kyi zhalchab ganggé lung

text.en: Lord who mastered all classes of tantra —
text.en-trans: tsor jé gyüdé kün la wanggyur gön

text.en: Jonang Kunga Nyingpo (Tāranātha), to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jonang künga nyingpor solwa deb

text.en: Born into the Nyö family, you taught thekamaandterma,
text.en-trans: nyö kyi rik lé sang chen kater ten

text.en: And caused the unbiased teachings of Buddha to spread,
text.en-trans: drenpé depön rimé gyalten pel

text.en: Your life and liberation into the three kāyas inconceivable —
text.en-trans: ku sum dzepé namtar sam mikhyab

text.en: Terchen Gyurme Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: terchen gyurmé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: As a youth, you encountered the fine Ganden tradition;
text.en-trans: zhönnur geden luk zang ten dang jal

text.en: Later, you became a disciple of the omniscient Jigme Lingpa,
text.en-trans: künkhyen jikme lingpé jesu zung

text.en: Mastering such feats of yogic conduct as reviving the dead —
text.en-trans: chiwa long sok tulzhuk chöpa kyong

text.en: Guyang Lodé Tsal, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: guyang lo dé tsal la solwa deb

text.en: Holder of the close lineage of the Golden Letter, quintessence of Atiyoga, pinnacle of vehicles,
text.en-trans: tek tsé yang ti ser drü nyegyü tsön

text.en: And other profound treasure teachings, as the Lake-born Guru prophesied,
text.en-trans: rangkal zabter kabab tsokyé jé

text.en: A heruka and master of the four means of liberation —
text.en-trans: lung zin drol zhi ngadak heruka

text.en: Kunzang Tongdrol Dorje, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: kunzang tongdrol dorjér solwa deb

text.en: When this most fortunate of eons draws to a close,
text.en-trans: namzhik kalzang tong tsé tama ru

text.en: You will manifest as the thousandth buddha, Möpa Tayé,
text.en-trans: deshek möpé ku ru zhengpé tsé

text.en: And through the four means of gathering and boundless activity,
text.en-trans: tsemé duwa nam zhi trinlé kyi

text.en: Bring saṃsāric existence to an end for all beings — to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dro kün si tar dzé la solwa deb

text.en: Also, at different times and in different places, according to beings’ temperament and capacity,
text.en-trans: zhenyang nedü drowé kham wang dang

text.en: You appear in various ways, both pure and impure,
text.en-trans: jetün gang dul nang ngor dak ma dak

text.en: As spiritual guides bringing benefit to those in need —
text.en-trans: dé dang der men shenyen gang dang gang

text.en: To you who display these various emanations, I pray.
text.en-trans: jinyé natsok tön la solwa deb

text.en: Now, in the lotus-grove of the entire Buddha’s teaching,
text.en-trans: dengdü tubten rimé pemö tsal

text.en: Disciples, like honeybees, enjoy their particular feasts,
text.en-trans: kün kyang duljé bungwa soso yi

text.en: But you in your devotion recognize the single taste of all —
text.en-trans: gatön nyi du ro chik mögü chen

text.en: Chökyi Lodrö, Kyabje Trulshik Rinpoche, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chökyi lodrö drak la solwa deb

text.en: The imprints of your compassion blossomed from an early age,
text.en-trans: jipa nyi né nyingjé bakchak té

text.en: And you yearned to leave everything behind and travel to lonely places,
text.en-trans: künpang ri sul drim la cher tro yang

text.en: Yet your kind masters recognized you as a sublime incarnation
text.en-trans: drinchen lamé dampé kyewa ru

text.en: And you heeded their advice — to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ngak né ka zhin drub la solwa deb

text.en: You received the blessing of the wisdom-mind lineage of
text.en-trans: lung zin yudré dögar nyikdü dir

text.en: Samantabhadra, the luminous vajra,
text.en-trans: sang sum dzepé trinlé tayepa

text.en: From the emanation of Yudra Nyingpo prophesied for this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpo ösal dorjé yi

text.en: With activity of secret body, speech and mind beyond limit —to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gong gyü jinlab tob la solwa deb

text.en: You followed many spiritual guides and teachers,
text.en-trans: yongdzin shenyen dampa mangdu ten

text.en: Received teachings and transmissions of sūtra, tantra and quintessential instruction,
text.en-trans: dogyü lung rik mengak duma tö

text.en: And took them all to heart, never neglecting your vows and commitments —
text.en-trans: tö döndam dom khyé duma separ

text.en: To you whose activity is pure, I pray.
text.en-trans: künchö tsangmé dzé la solwa deb

text.en: In particular, you followed the two great treasure-revealers,
text.en-trans: khyepar pema jung dang bi ma ngö

text.en: Who were none other than Padmasambhava and Vimalamitra in person,
text.en-trans: terchen chöjé nampé jezung né

text.en: And these veritable lords of the Dharma appointed you
text.en-trans: pema tsé yi nyingtik lasok kyi

text.en: Custodian of the Pema Tseyi Nyingtik and other cycles — to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chö kyi dakpor ukyung solwa deb

text.en: In sacred sites throughout India, Nepal, and Tibet,
text.en-trans: pakpé yul sok bal bö né chen du

text.en: You diligently studied, taught the sublime Dharma and made cloud-like offerings,
text.en-trans: damchö chenyen tsön dang chötrin trö

text.en: Entirely untainted by the eight worldly concerns —
text.en-trans: kün kyang chö gyé zol dang madrepar

text.en: To you who endured hardship with pure motivation, I pray!
text.en-trans: lhaksam kaché drub der solwa deb

text.en: You were not led astray by the demon of sensory pleasures,
text.en-trans: lha bü dü kyi lü sam duwa sum

text.en: Resources and honour did not come to you through effort in the three gatherings,
text.en-trans: ma ngé tsolwé ma drub nyekur dzé

text.en: But you allocated funds solely to temples and enlightened representations, as well as other altruistic aims —
text.en-trans: gönné ten sum trün dang zhenpen du

text.en: To you who offered all without the slightest grasping, I pray!
text.en-trans: tong lé dakdzin dral la solwa deb

text.en: You saw that the pure life of a perfect saint
text.en-trans: puljung dampé nampar tarpa dang

text.en: And the endless confusion of acting only for this life
text.en-trans: dinang zinmé trulpé jawa dak

text.en: Are equal within the natural dharmadhātu expanse —
text.en-trans: chö kün chönyi long du nyam dalwé

text.en: To you who banished hope and fear, I pray!
text.en-trans: redok tsenmé wen la solwa deb

text.en: In youth you became a monk dedicated to the teachings,
text.en-trans: dak ni zhönnur ten la rab jungwé

text.en: And avoided the distractions of an ordinary childhood;
text.en-trans: khyimtab jipé namyeng pong tsam lé

text.en: Yet you didn’t think yourself superior or entertain worldly concerns,
text.en-trans: deté lomsem chö gyé ma chi kyang

text.en: But made only virtuous aspirations — to you, I pray!
text.en-trans: dezhin mö gé tak la solwa deb

text.en: ‘It is difficult to bless others without first maturing oneself,
text.en-trans: rangnyi ma min zhen jin lab ka yang

text.en: But anyone with faith shall receive inspiration’ —
text.en-trans: gangla mö na dé yi jin lobpar

text.en: Thus, according to these words of the Buddha and the ways of the past,
text.en-trans: gyalwé lung dang ngön jung tsul né kyi

text.en: I pray with threefold faith, pure vision and devotion!
text.en-trans: dé sum daknang möpé solwa deb

text.en: Henceforth, until I and others attain the essence of enlightenment,
text.en-trans: deng zung rangzhen changchub nyingpö bar

text.en: May you grant us blessings, so we may follow the perfect, authentic teacher,
text.en-trans: kyöndral tsenden lamé jezung té

text.en: Avoid the abyss of erroneous ways and false paths,
text.en-trans: lamgol lokpé yangsa lé drol né

text.en: And set out upon the supreme path to omniscience!
text.en-trans: namkhyen lam chok gojé jingyi lob

text.en: May we develop a mind of renunciation for suffering and its origin,
text.en-trans: dukngal künjung khorwé gyu dang dré

text.en: The causes and results of saṃsāra that are so difficult to bear,
text.en-trans: zöpar kawar ngejung lo kyé né

text.en: And always train in the most magnificent of paths,
text.en-trans: lab chen lamzang tsemé nampa zhi

text.en: Supreme bodhicitta with its four boundless qualities!
text.en-trans: changchub sem chok taktu jongwar shok

text.en: May we realize the view of the Great Middle Way beyond extremes,
text.en-trans: tawa tadral uma chenpo tok

text.en: Meditate upon the luminous Great Seal (Mahāmudrā) as the path,
text.en-trans: gompa chakchen ösal lam du long

text.en: Render evident the resultant state of the Great Perfection,
text.en-trans: drebu zhir drol dzogchen ngöngyur pé

text.en: And enact the conduct that delights the buddhas and their heirs!
text.en-trans: gyalsé gyepé chöpar lob nü shok

text.en: May the union of the two obscurations that shrouds beings in darkness
text.en-trans: drib nyi zungjuk dro kham münpé mak

text.en: Be dispelled by the path of sun and moon, the union of sūtra and tantra,
text.en-trans: do ngak zungjuk nyidé lam gyi sal

text.en: To bring about the dependent arising of the union of the two kāyas,
text.en-trans: ku nyi zungjuk ten ching drel jung chö

text.en: So that the union of twofold benefit may blaze in perfect splendour!
text.en-trans: dön nyi zungjuk tashi palbar shok
